page.title: 08MY HOUSE
page.content: 24,Meldon Way,High Shincliffe. My house is a bungalow.It is about ten years old.Its position is nearly at the end of the street. My house is made with brick,metal,wood,glass and plaster.It has eight rooms,a bathroom,a lavatory,a lounge,a kitchen,a games room,and four bedrooms.It also has a hall. At the back and at the front of my house are two gardens,they are both fairly big,the front garden is about 30 meters square,at the back about 40 meters square. My house has a garage built onto the side.The garage also acts as a shed for keeping tools and leftover paint. The house has a total of ten windows including three facing farmlands towards Cassop and sherburn. STUART FERGUSON(9)
